2020-02-05T03:44:04.000Z: Remember. Listen to what people say, but watch what they do.  It's time for action. Generations of Americans are counting on us. Let's not let them down. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:42:57.000Z: Democrats want safe schools. We want your water to be clean. We want you to love who you love, and to live authentically, as your true selves. We want women to have autonomy over our bodies. We want our country to be welcoming, & everyone's vote to be counted. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:42:19.000Z: Young people - you inspire us. You know that democracy takes action. You react to a world that is literally on fire with a fire in your bellies. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:42:00.000Z: Governor @JBPritzker is rebuilding roads and bridges in Illinois. @GovMurphy is replacing lead pipes in New Jersey. @GovLauraKelly is working across the aisle to expand Medicaid coverage in Kansas. @GovMLG enshrined ACA protections into New Mexico state law.
2020-02-05T03:41:19.000Z: Who fights for hardworking Americans? Democrats. And let me tell you, #DemGovsGetItDone . #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:40:02.000Z: Michigan invented the middle class. So, we know - if the economy doesn't work for working people, it just doesn't work. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:39:36.000Z: When the President says the economy is strong, my question is: strong for whom? Strong for the wealthy? Who are reaping the rewards from tax cuts they don't need? #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:38:19.000Z: When it comes to health care, here is the truth: Democrats are trying to make your health care better. Republicans in Washington are trying to take it away. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:37:28.000Z: I lost patience for people who are just talk and no action. So, as a state senator, I worked with a Republican governor and legislature to expand health care coverage to more than 680,000 Michiganders under the Affordable Care Act. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:37:14.000Z: It was hard. It exposed the harsh realities of our workplaces, our health care system, and our child care system. And it changed me. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:37:02.000Z: When I was 30, I was up all night with a baby, and during the day, I had to fight my mom's insurance company when they wrongly denied her coverage for chemotherapy. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:36:39.000Z: For me, for so many Americans, health care is personal. Not political. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:36:30.000Z: Bullying people on Twitter doesn't fix bridges - it burns them.  Our energy should be used to solve problems. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:36:22.000Z: When it comes to infrastructure, Monte has tried to do more with a shovel and a pile of dirt than the Republicans in DC have with the Oval Office AND the US Senate. #SOTUResponse GIF
2020-02-05T03:35:32.000Z:
During my campaign, people told me to fix the damn roads - because blown tires and broken windshields are downright dangerous. And car repairs take money from rent, child care, or groceries.
And we - the Democrats - are doing something about it. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:35:01.000Z: Meet Monte Scott. We wouldn't be surprised if he was giving the #SOTUResponse one day. Fixing 'the damn roads' himself: Boy filling potholes in Muskegon Heights He's already filled 15 potholes on his street. wzzm13.com
2020-02-05T03:34:37.000Z: We might be weary of today's politics, but we must stay engaged. Our country, our democracy, our future demand it. We are capable of great things when we work together. #SOTUResponse
2020-02-05T03:34:24.000Z: So, instead of talking about what the President is saying, I am going to highlight what Democrats are doing.  After all, you can listen to what someone says, but to know the truth - watch what they do. #SOTUResponse
